text: Devika Rani Choudhuri (30 March 1908 â€“ 9 March 1994), usually known as Devika Rani, was an Indian actress. She was active in Hindi movies during the 1930s and 1940s. Widely known as the first lady of Indian cinema, Devika Rani had a successful movie career for 10 years. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1908 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Indian movie actors
title: Devika Rani
